alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Columbia, northeastern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Suwannee Valley, or near White Springs, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Springs, Wellborn, Five Points, Winfield and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
